Hand

      Subclasses of Hand in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Flush
      This class models a Flush hand.
      class  FullHouse
      Models a Full House.
      class  Pair
      This hand consists of two cards with the same rank.
      class  Quad
      This hand consists of five cards, with four having the same rank.
      class  Single
      This hand consists of only one single card.
      class  Straight
      This hand consists of five cards with consecutive ranks.
      class  StraightFlush
      This hand consists of five cards with consecutive ranks and the same suit.
      class  Triple
      This hand consists of three cards with the same rank.
